method: Put the flour, salt and egg into a bowl and roughly mix together. Put the water and lard in a small saucepan and heat together until it reaches boiling point. Stir into the flour mixture and bring into a ball. Wrap in clingfilm and rest at room temperature for 5 minutes before moulding into your pie dish or mould. The pastry will harden as it cools.
